comments.body: I'll defer to @nckturner on this one. Reference to gce-zone seems confusing in context of the AWS cloud provider. Is this referring to something other than Google Compute Engine?

Its just the argument name, I believe `--gce-zone` configures `cloudconfig.zone` so it was just re-used by the aws framework.  (It's not usually required, that's why we want to remove the argument requirement).
